author: Kreusada
description: Publish your new cogs to a specific channel.
install_msg: Thanks for installing, have fun. Use `[p]help PublishCogs`! This cog is complex and could get confusing upon setup. Stuck along the way? Check out our documentation: https://kreusadacogs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/publishcogs.html#publishcogs
short: Publish new cogs in your guild.
name: PublishCogs
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
